falsificationAttempts.targetDescription: Provider batch APIs can be unified behind a common adapter with reliable partial retries.
falsificationQueries: Review provider batch API semantics and webhook vs polling requirements
Check Convex workflow durability limits and idempotency patterns
falsificationAttempts.falsificationAnalysis: Local evidence suggests durable workflows and rate limiting patterns, but provider batch API semantics are not yet verified; adapter unification remains a risk.
